page.title: 06SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: Many of our social concerns are caused by a lack of money being spent on amenities for all age groups, e.g. social clubs and leisure facilities. Unemployment has been causing concern for as long as I can remember. People are being made redundant and cannot get another job. Sometimes young people who cannot get jobs get depressed and start taking drugs. A rise in crime is also worrying. There is a lot of vandalism and more burglaries than ever are being committed. The local Police Superintendent says "I want to start up more community watches which are a great way for people to protect their property." A current worry is the rise in rates which involves all members of the community. In line with national feeling people here would like a change in the rates.
